title: 150 - Cremation Clearance Sale
description:
The gang tries to paint a picture of the typical Hodunk listener and discusses discount cremation practices. Heather opens up about her family’s fancy (and no-longer secret) Italian hotel. Tim learns to speak German, for dogs. Livy makes her father an offer he simply can’t refuse. Luke unveils his plan to make millions with little more than a box fan. And, crappaw returns to either show support or take his vengeance! You never can tell with him.
Big Thanks To Our Sponsors!

Faithful Counseling: Go to https://faithfulcounseling.com/timhawkins for 10% off of your first month of counseling!
